main event: A high school student observed an elliptical, bright, silver object hovering near Disneyland, Anaheim, California on November 6, 1957.
interesting points: The object was approximately 100 feet in diameter and hovered at an estimated height of 800 to 1000 feet.,The object remained perfectly still for about 2-3 minutes before accelerating rapidly and disappearing., The witness reported the sighting to the local Air Force for two days., Civilian investigators could find no evidence to substantiate the claim., The investigation suggested the possibility of the sighting being an attempted hoax due to the lack of corroborating evidence.
witness description: a high school student who was watching television at home when he saw the object.
